title: "Machine learning reveals hidden components of X-ray pulses"
excerpt: "Ultrafast pulses from X-ray lasers reveal how atoms move at timescales of a femtosecond. That's a quadrillionth of a second. However, measuring the properties of the pulses themselves is challenging."
